hans.name: Hans
hans.examine: Servant of the Duke of Lumbridge.

dialogue.greeting: Hello! What are you doing here?

responses.about: I am a servant to the Duke of Lumbridge.

responses.quest: Do you seek adventure? I might have a quest for you.
responses.about: I am the Duke of Lumbridge, ruler of this region.

dialogue.greeting: Ah, an adventurer! What brings you to my humble abode?

responses.quest: I might have some tasks that need doing...
responses.about: I've spent my life gathering knowledge and wisdom.
responses.bank: Yes, that bank incident... let's not talk about that.

responses.task: I'll assign you a slayer task...
responses.about: I am one of the most experienced Slayer masters.
responses.training: I can give you some combat training advice.

grand_exchange_clerk.name: Grand Exchange Clerk
grand_exchange_clerk.examine: She works at the Grand Exchange.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to the Grand Exchange! How may I help you?

responses.trade: I can help you buy and sell items.
responses.about: The Grand Exchange is the central trading hub of Gielinor.
responses.history: I can show you your trading history.
